title: Drawing, "Mountain Ranges with Rugged Peaks, near Machachi, Ecuador", June 19, 1857
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  2 [Telris (?)] yellow; at upper center:  2; at center right:  Near Machachi June 19th 57 / 2- Rainbow effect
description: Horizontal view of mountain ranges and rugged peaks across upper portion of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountain Ranges with Rugged Peaks, near Machachi, Ecuador", June 19, 1857.
June 19, 1857. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-241.
